plot: The summer finally ends. Ben and Gwen have to go back to their normal lives. Grandpa Max tells Ben to keep the Omnitrix a secret from everyone, even his parents. Ben agrees, but Vilgax arrives and he'll stop at nothing to get the Omnitrix.

The summer ends, and Ben and Gwen must each be returned home for the new school year. It's especially aggravating for Ben. National appearances of the Omnitrix aliens over the summer leaves the entire school abuzz, but Grandpa Max's instruction to keep their connection to the alien heroes secret denies Ben any bragging rights. Fortunately, when Vilgax decides to attack the school and threaten the town, he cements young Tennyson's reputation as a kid to look up to.—statmanjeff
